data.eml:eml: Two new species of scalpelliform barnacles (Cirripedia: Thoracica) from the Plio-Pleistocene of Cotentin, northwest France

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Carriol, René-Pierre (2013): Two new species of scalpelliform barnacles (Cirripedia: Thoracica) from the Plio-Pleistocene of Cotentin, northwest France. Zootaxa 3641 (1): 21-30, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3641.1.2
